descriptionNullable:
### License
This dataset is licensed with CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 BR. ### Disclamers All news and information present in this dataset originates from [The Brazilian Federal's Digital Library](https://www2.senado.leg.br/bdsf/). ### Context When building an `nlp`model consistency and reliability are the utmost importance, therefore this datasets collects curated news from known sources (specified in `citation column`) ### Content ### Inspiration - Can financial data be predicted with news?
